index.intro: i18n Starter is a simple Astro theme for creating multilingual websites. It supports i18n feature from Astro v4.0.
index.subdirectories: Basically, only the subdirectory URL scheme is supported. It is managed by the URL as follows for each language. The root URL is redirected to the specified default language.

blog.title: Blog
blog.sample: A sample for managing blog or news content. It uses Astro's content collection.
